title: TUNA MELTS
directions: In small mixing bowl, combine tuna, mayonnaise, onion powder, celery seed, pepper and salt. Mix well. Divide and spread mixture evenly on bread slices. Top each sandwich with 1 tomato slice and 1 cheese slice. Place sandwiches on paper towel-lined plate or paper plate. Microwave at Power Level 7 for 3 1/2 to 4 minutes, or until cheese melts, rotating plate 2 times. Yield: 4 sandwiches.
ingredients: 4 slices whole wheat or white bread, toasted
4 slices process American cheese food (about 3/4 oz. each)
